title: Can you play lol in Asia without Transfering
body: Can you play LOL in Asia for free without transferring because it doesn't say anything on transferring your account to an asian acount

replies.body:
1) You can play on OCE if you are in Asia as long as you can connect to the OCE server. In China (with exception of Hong Kong) you will not be able to connect to any servers outside of China.

2) Asian servers are not run by Riot, they are run by Garena in south-east Asia, and by other companies in Korea and China. You can't transfer accounts to or from these regions.
